remember.name: Ataraxia Club - Septiembre 2019 - September 2019 | @ataraxia_club

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Septiembre 2019 - September 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: Last party to dismiss this season and make way for the summer. The guys from the Arizonica Music label will be in charge of bringing freshness and happy rhythms to our session. A pack made up of Abel Su√°rez, Omar Ortiz and Pabel Son. Dj's and producers with years of experience decided to launch the creation of the label to share with the world that they have much to contribute. Together with our djs residents Javier de la Vega and Julio MartineZ we will put the finishing touch to a very good season where we have been able to enjoy many artists and live incomparable night.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Julio 2019 - July 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: Last party to dismiss this season and make way for the summer. The guys from the Arizonica Music label will be in charge of bringing freshness and happy rhythms to our session. A pack made up of Abel Su√°rez, Omar Ortiz and Pabel Son. Dj's and producers with years of experience decided to launch the creation of the label to share with the world that they have much to contribute. events.name: Ataraxia Club - Junio 2019 - June 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: We welcome the good weather with a big house. YRM, Canarian artist recently signed by Be One Records with his EP 'Repeat with me' will be the guest that will make you enjoy a night of heart attack. A taste for exquisite music with a groove that characterizes him immediately when we listen to his tracks on labels such as 'Low Groove Records', '1994 Music' or 'Datagroove Music'. Three artists come together on a special night, which we will probably dance to mythical house themes like 'Good Vibes' or 'Dancing Groove' recently played in 'Elrow' of Tenerife. Prepare the sneakers because on Saturday June 15 you have an appointment in Ataraxia.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Mayo 2019 - May 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: After two years, Ataraxia is still working to offer an alternative quality party. For this month of May, the guest DJ will come from the Canary Islands, Andr√©s Meier. It is a young Spanish promise with German roots recently signed by 'Be One Records Limited'. The pillars of this project will be with him, Javier de la Vega & Julio Martinez.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Abril 2019 - April 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: Ataraxia Club is celebrating, 2 years full of enthusiasm, work and sacrifice. This brand of electronic music works to expand its borders with a concept of alternative party, leaving the conventionality in the posters, infusing an atypical atmosphere where good energy is breathed on the dancefloor and a musical line taken care of by its resident dj's, Javier de la Vega & Julio Martinez. Saturday, April 6, comes loaded with exciting surprises that will make a different and special night at CAFE LA PALMA üéÅ. This day we will have Underground Calling as guests for the occasion. An explosive duo that is characterized by raising the energy of the track to its maximum exponent. His sets have become a waste of judgment and emotion. Currently, they are focused on the publication of two of their latest tracks; 'Pussy' that will soon be released on the label 'NoreligionLab' and 'Fifa' on 'Distorsion'. A quality line-up to celebrate that this project aims high, where good music is assured.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Marzo 2019 - March 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: We continue!! In the month of March will come a special guest, Danny Leblack. Creator of parties like 'Now Underground Club'. Young Dj and producer of the Madrid music scene, already more than twenty years dedicated to the world of music. These night, Javier de la Vega and Julio Martinez will melt into a b2b with the essence of Ataraxia, groove & bass.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Febrero 2019 - February 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: We return with the charged batteries. As a guest, come back with us, Seventh Dimension. After his passage in June, he left very good feelings, that's why he is one of the first to repeat. Javier De La Vega & Julio MartineZ they will follow the musical line that defines them, 'Groove & Bass'.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Enero 2019 - January 2019 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: See you in 2019!! Saturday January 12 with Javier De La Vega and Julio Martinez Delgado. In the warm-up will come with us DjAmpu. You are invited to entry to Ataraxia's world

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Diciembre 2018 - December 2018 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: Last party of the year!We will close with two guests who are bursting it in the Canary Islands.YRM: 1994 Music and signed by Low Groove Records, where he has entered the top 100 of Beatport with his latest EP, 'La Pasadena'. This Dj and producer has been promoted on track by djs of the likes of Latmun and Dennis Cruz. It is a sure guarantee that he will make us dance with his class and staging accompanied by Bwotah, a promising young dj from the island, who aims high after her passing parties with Hangover.With them will be our musical pillars, Javier de la Vega and Julio Mart√≠nez. A night that promises to dismiss the year at the height it deserves. ¬°√öltima fiesta del a√±o! Cerraremos con dos invitados que est√°n reventandolo en las Islas Canarias. YRM: 1994 Music y fichado por Low Groove Records, donde ha entrado en el top100 de Beatport con su √∫ltimo EP, 'La Pasadena'. Este Dj y productor ha sido promocionado en pista por djs de la talla de Latmun y Dennis cruz. Es garant√≠a segura de que nos har√° bailar con su clase y puesta en escena acompa√±ado de Bwotah, una joven promesa de la isla, que apunta alto tras su paso haciendo fiestas con Hangover. Con ellos estar√°n nuestros pilares musicales, Javier de la Vega y Julio Mart√≠nez. Una noche que promete despedir el a√±o a la altura que se merece.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Noviembre 2018 - November 2018 | @ataraxia_club
events.description: Non stop! In the next week we will start again to offer you the penultimate party of this year. This November we will be joined by Abel Su√°rez and Omar Ort√≠z in a b2b that promises to give you elegance and freshness in the floor. They will be accompanied by our resident djs Javier de la Vega & Julio MartineZ with his groove and bass rhythm.

events.name: Ataraxia Club - Octubre 2018 - October 2018
events.description: For this occasion, Ataraxia will have with Pedro Rodr√≠guez, a well-known DJ in the electronic music scene in Madrid. Promoter and resident of the session The Mini-club in the Bash room. He will be accompanied by our residents Javier de la Vega and Julio MartineZ. With this line up, Ataraxia promises to continue offering us a quality night

special_events.name: Ataraxia Summer - Julio 2019 - July 2019 | @ataraxia_club
special_events.description: The TasteClub room will be in charge of welcoming us on Saturday July 13 with a poster product of the capital. Cristian C√°rdenas and Luismy Jim√©nez identified their moment in a b2b to reveal a dancer with the most groove sound that characterizes them. 7thDimension has earned its place to show that it has a lot to offer the music industry. And of course, the pillars of the project, our residents Javier de la Vega and Julio Mart√≠nez with the purest sound of the house 'groove and bass'.

resident.name: Javier
resident.description:
Nacido en Espa√±a, con m√°s de 10 a√±os de experiencia a sus espaldas como Dj, este madrile√±o, empez√≥ a los 14 a√±os de edad a introducirse en el mundo del disc-jockey. Dos a√±os mas tarde ya estaba actuando ante el p√∫blico en una de las famosas discotecas de Madrid, Pach√°.
Siempre ha estado a la vanguardia dentro de la electr√≥nica, desde el hard‚Äêdance y el progressive house en sus comienzos, hasta el tech house y deep house m√°s selecto que distingue sus sets en la actualidad.
Caracterizado por un estilo de groove y bass divertido, mezclado con cortes vocales underground y tropicales. Un estilo propio con mucho car√°cter con el que transmite al p√∫blico su propia personalidad.
Ha tenido la oportunidad de traspasar fronteras madrile√±as en ciudades como √Åvila, Guadalajara, Segovia, Ciudad Real, Toledo o la misma isla de Ibiza.
Pasando por salas de renombre como FABRIK ‚ÄùSupermartx√©‚Äù, LA RIVIERA ‚ÄúReverse‚Äù, ‚ÄúTech In da House‚Äù o la sala GROOVE, as√≠ como clubs de m√∫sica electr√≥nica ‚ÄúMini Club‚Äù, ‚ÄúXoow‚Äù, ‚ÄúAngels‚Äù ‚ÄúAir Mad Music‚Äù, Pirandello, Avalon‚Ä¶
Promotor y Dj Residente de la sesi√≥n ‚ÄúATARAXIA‚Äù afincada en ‚ÄúCaf√© La Palma‚Äù. Tambi√©n ha formado parte de varios festivales en Espa√±a: ‚ÄúAmazing Summer Festival‚Äù(Ciudad Real), ‚ÄúConcept Festival‚Äù (Toledo), ‚ÄúXtravaganzza‚Äù y ‚ÄúBay Day‚Äù. Ha compartido cabina con artistas de la talla de Cristian Varela, Dj Nano, Vitalic, Eric Sneo, Felix Krocher, Uner, Marcos In Dub, Raul Mezcolanza, Oscar Aguilera, Ismael Rivas, Charles Ramirez, Freeman, Danny Leblack, Karretero, Kike Medina o Pedro Rodr√≠guez.
Para alguien de la capacidad de Javier, pinchar en Espa√±a desde una edad temprana inevitablemente lo conducir√≠a a la producci√≥n.

resident.name: Julio
resident.description:
Nacido en Madrid. A sus 18 a√±os empez√≥ a introducirse en el mundo de la m√∫sica electr√≥nica. Todo empez√≥ en la sesi√≥n ‚ÄúDanzoo‚Äù cuando descubri√≥ que esa era su pasi√≥n.
Se introdujo como Dj pinchando en las raves m√°s multitudinarias de Madrid. Sus sets se caracterizan por un groove oscuro. Dinamismo y soltura son algunos adjetivos que definen a Julio en cabina. Los temas ‚Äúretro‚Äù versionados al tech actual combinado con un bass potente hacen del artista una ecuaci√≥n que fluye en pista a la perfecci√≥n.
A√±os m√°s tarde comenz√≥ a introducirse en el mundo de la producci√≥n musical d√≥nde ha estado y sigue trabajando en la sombra para pulir el sonido que quiere mostrar al mundo. Poco tiempo despu√©s lanz√≥ sus primeros tracks por el sello de ‚ÄúSells Muzik‚Äù.
Julio Martinez sigue trabajando fuerte en el sector de la producci√≥n para plasmar que su proyecto va adquiriendo m√°s profesionalidad.
Dj residente de la sesi√≥n ATARAXIA en ‚ÄúCaf√© La Palma‚Äù, la sala ‚ÄúGroove‚Äù, o el festival de Ciudad Real ‚ÄúBay Day‚Äù son algunos de los sitios donde Julio ha ido dejando su huella.
